website_summaries.verdict: This quality grill comes from one of cooking’s best known names. It has numerous valuable features yet remains very affordable.
pros: A good mid-range option that offers plenty of warming and cooking space for the average family, plus useful side tables for added prep space
Grates are cast iron for better heat retention
cons: Inconsistent finishing can lead to rust

customer_reviews.title: Cuisnart makes a grill???
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first because I had never heard of a cuisanart brand grill but for the price and research, it seemed like it was worth trying. I received grill without any issues and no damages. It was simple to assemble in less than 45 minutes. Used it about a dozen times and cooks evenly and heats up fast. It is also easy to clean compared to other grills I've had in the past so that was a nice experience. Perfect product at this price point and would definitely purchase again. I'm receiving a free scraper for this review. I would still give it five stars without a scraper.
customer_reviews.author: Sun E D

customer_reviews.title: Great priced full size grill from Cuisinart
customer_reviews.text: This full size grill is a great value! I expect good quality from Cuisinart but typically plan to pay more for the brand. Not this time. the 7400 was easy to assemble, the instructions are easy to follow, and the quality of the components could be more in line with a $300 grill. I know this because I purchased and assembled a competitive grill for my son in law last year and this one is every bit as nice.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This was a backup grill for an apt. My primary is a Weber. There is no comparison. A grill needs to retain heat with a lid that retains heat. This is thin sheet metal. The grill is not cast iron nor non stick material. Item also arrived damaged. I ordered my Weber from Amazon with no issues. As much of a pain it is. This one is going back.
customer_reviews.author: New York Client

customer_reviews.title: Great grill for the price
customer_reviews.text: Only reason why it's four stars instead of five it's because whoever is doing the shipping beats the poop out of the cartons and ends up having dents on the unit. But it is a grill the depths on the porcelain finish black I'm going to have to paint over to keep from rusting the dent on the top is a minor annoyance. What you assemble the grill it works flawlessly I simply love this grill for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: The grill arrived two days after ordering, and was easy to assemble - start to finish under an hour. The grille temp gauge is a nice feature and it does seem to accurately reflect the internal temperature. Very stable fame - no wobble at all. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Lawry

customer_reviews.title: Lousy grill, will not get hot enough
customer_reviews.text: I grill a LOT in Key West, all year. I have many years of experience with Charbroil. Unfortunately after 2 years they are a throw away, rust, gas vents corrode, etc.. So I tried this this Cuisinart hoping it would last longer. Cuisinart is poorly designed. Highly undependable spark starters on each burner takes many attempts for each burner. BTW, why have a sparker on each burner?. The heat output at maximum is about 60% of the Charbroil grill. I can't cook effectively on this. And BTW, this has occurred with 3 different propane tanks. It has been another couple of months, I'm putting it on the curb. What a poorly engineered piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jig saw puzzles are not my forte
customer_reviews.text: It’s been 2 weeks since my grill was delivered. Little did I know that it comes completely unassembled with 100s of screws, nuts and other pieces. I put the cart together myself in an afternoon even though the pictures were so bad that you couldn’t decipher which way the wheels go on. Now I sit and wait until I can find a young man to help lift the grill onto the cart since the instructions (drawings) show 2 people are required for this job. In the meantime I am using my small Weber kettle grill with Charcoal, fire wax and matches. Sometimes upgrading one’s life brings too many complications. Save yourself some aggravation and buy a pre-assembled grill.
customer_reviews.author: old lady artist

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for the price.
customer_reviews.text: First, I feel like I have put 50 grills together in my lifetime. Cuisinart’s first entry into the big grill market was a big success at my house. The directions are clear, parts are identified and quality build ensures easy assembly because connecting points all line up perfectly. I haven’t cooked with it yet but with the 4 burner setup should really allow custom temp control. It has two side shelves but no side burner (I never used that feature anyway). The price was great. I can’t say enough about this grill. I will buy another for my winter Texas home even if they raise the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Very nice grill.  Good value and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to operate. Fires up and heats up quick and efficiently. No complaints. It was also very easy to put together. It took about 1 1/2 hours to put together and I only needed another person's help (my eleven year old son) a couple times to hold something steady or lift something carefully together. One small complaint is that it did NOT come with any sort of covering, so I had to buy one. I could have understood that before my order, so I hold myself accountable for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grill for the price
customer_reviews.text: Have had the grill for over a year now and it has performed flawlessly. Burners light every time, provides nice even adjustable heat and has held up well. Will definitely buy another one for my other house when I need a new grill there. I should be receiving a grill scraper for submitting this review but would have rated it high and submitted it without the perk.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Fox

customer_reviews.title: Extremely difficult assembly with very poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are all pictures, no verbiage. You have to be very careful to study each picture to get things right the first time. For those of us not good at spatial thinking (seeing things in relationship to their space), that makes it extremely difficult. Also, we have a part (chain of some sort) hanging from a leg without a word of explanation that we can find in the installation or operating instructions. As far as the grill itself goes, I'm sure it's fine. The burners light and get very hot. What more can you ask for from a grill.
customer_reviews.author: GARY JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Grill!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fires up instantly every time and I can maintain a steady temperature perfectly. A great bonus on this grill, that I didn't realize untill assembling it, is the whole entire drip pan system underneath is removable for easy cleanup. I'll never purchase another grill without this! Clean up is so time saving and easy now! Assembly was fairly easy but in the beginning it was hard to match each piece of hardware to each step in the instructions. More then half the items are not clearly marked with a letter that matches the instruction manual. The pictures helped but if everything was marked with a corresponding letter, it might have made the process of the project run more smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Anissa

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive but built with quality inmind
customer_reviews.text: It arrived well boxed via UPS. Assembled in 45 minutes with only a medium Philips head screwdriver. Simple construction but robust. The stainless cover seems to be constructed of 304 stainless as it only is very slightly magnetic. That will mean that it may develop minor rust over time. So it would be advised to place a cover on it when not in use. The burners work great. Fit and finish are much higher than the 199 dollar price tag would suggest.
customer_reviews.author: biff

customer_reviews.title: It's a grill...
customer_reviews.text: We usually get 3-4 years out of a gas grill before there's nothing left to repair. This one appears to have more stainless parts in it than the last one did so maybe it'll last longer. Ease of assembly couldn't have been more spectacular 'cause my wife put it together, and I didn't have to.
customer_reviews.author: S. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill
customer_reviews.text: We normally purchase Char-broil or Weber products, but we decided to give Cuisinart grill a chance. The grill took about 2 hours to put together. We cooked meat and vegetables last weekend. It has a lot of space to cook everything. Liked how it would keep the temperature inside the grill an even heat. It's also very easy to clean. Side tables offer plenty of space to place the sauces and tools. We are very happy with our purchase. Look forward to more grilling time. Received a free gift in exchange for posting this review.
customer_reviews.author: stangal

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and food comes out perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Solid construction. Has all the grilling space to cook 20 burgers plus with the high rack I can add a couple dozen hot dogs that cook perfectly without burning. The knobs turn smoothly and ignight the burners every time. It's made in a way that's simple to clean with a removable tray and grease collector. Cast iron cooking surface cleans easily and is solid. The heat is even and easily controlled and I am grilling better quality than on the previous gas grill. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Cast iron grates are good
customer_reviews.text: Love the heavy duty cast iron grates on this grill, easy to clean with a plastic bristle brush when cool and easy to season with soybean oil when heating. 4 burners are good, ignite we'll, and get up to heat quickly. Thermometer is even ballpark accurate. Metal on grill arrived bent. Grill does not hold heat well due to thin aluminum drip tray under burners. Put a few fireplace bricks on the tray and you're good to go. This grill is basically like all others in the $100-200 range...cheaply made and will likely last 3-8 years.
customer_reviews.author: ksp

customer_reviews.title: This is a great grill. Each burner has it’s own control
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grill. Each burner has it’s own control. We replaced a CharBroil grill with this Cruisinart and happy we did. The food we prepare on our new Cruisinart grill is so much better than it was on the CharBroil grill! The instructions, for assembling the grill, were right on. It really takes 2 people to assemble it-some pieces need to be held while the other person is assembling it. Then too, you can pay extra to have the grill assembled. We had never assembled a grill so it did take us a couple of hours putting it together-learning experience. The flavor of the food is worth the extra work and value.
customer_reviews.author: Sally J Orlow

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces and won't stay ignited
customer_reviews.text: I will start off by saying this was the easiest grill I have ever assembled, outside of the missing screws I had to do without (No side trays). It's not as spacious as I was hoping for a 4 burner grill, but it's okay for a small family. At first it didn't want to ignite, but after waiting a bit, it finally lit up, then decided to go out... Multiple times. It was a struggle to keep this thing lit, which might be due to the windy day and the huge gap in the back. You can easily get a better grill from Charbroil for the same price, and I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: There Are Some Who Call Me Tim

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Value
customer_reviews.text: We've owned a lot of gas grills over the years of every brand name and class. This Cuisinart is slightly larger than we wanted (4 burner, vs 3 burner), but the price point was so aggressive we had to try this brand name at bargain name price, and we are so glad we did. This grill was relatively easy to put together, clearly is well made, and operated the first time we tried to light the grill. The heat is consistent over the whole cooking surface, and clean up has been easy so far. If you can find one of these purchase it, you'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall very good
customer_reviews.text: I like the even heat across the grill. Some hot and cool spots but great overall. I am a little disappointed (in myself) that I didn't notice there are only 2 wheels and two feet instead of 4 wheels so kind of a pain moving around on the patio. I am also sorry I didn't notice the propane tank is obvious on the right side and has fallen off when moving it once. I plan to find a way to add two more wheels to replace the two feet.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: YOU WON'T REGRET THIS PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews carefully before buying. The directions were clear and diagrams helpful and made assembly easy. It took me around 2 hours to build but with a few interruptions and nothing was difficult. My husband helped to lift the main part of the grill on the stand. If I had to build a second one, it would take 30 minutes the second time. I had never built a grill before. It started up and works perfectly. I am happy with my purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mayme Grim

customer_reviews.title: Buy this grill
customer_reviews.text: I have had 1500 and 1000 dollar for me pretty expensive grills for decades This grill is an awesome griller for about 350! The heat is even, the size is more than enough for two to three racks of ribs. Two side tables, and the burner row lights as you turn the knob what’s not to like? Awesome grill Cuisinart!
customer_reviews.author: Bldaz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my Weber grill, which served me for 20 years. I bought this Cuisinart grill because it was about half the price of a Weber. The main problem with this grill is that it constantly flames up because of the cheap shrouds over the burners. It is a constant battle to keep steaks from being burned. Now, I wish that I had paid twice as much and bought a Weber, which has "flavor bars" that keep flare-ups under control. Mice love building nests in this grill, so maybe I'll move it back in my woods and let them have it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Enyeart

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grill but Get Out the Drill!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice grill for the price, but as other reviews mentioned, there were no holes drilled for the handle installation. Nothing is worse than having to take a drill to something brand new out of the box. See the photo ... It almost looks like the holes were drilled in the wrong spot. You can see where we had to drill in comparison with where the 2 larger holes are. What an inconvenience! Other than that issue, the instructions for assembly were easy to follow. The grill works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Lori O

customer_reviews.title: Rust on day one
customer_reviews.text: The price was good. I like Cuisinart brand. It showed up on time. I don’t think it is packaged well enough to be thrown around during delivery. I think the stressed areas are where the paint flakes off. This is after “one day” in SC humidity. It’s already rusting. I will probably just paint it with high temp paint. However, it’s a little surprising that rust exists on day one 🤨 made in China ???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built and not cheap at all
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat this grill, for the price paid, for the ease of assembly and operation, well-built, the first one was delivered and was Replaced because it was damaged making it unsafe to operate. Amazon was very professional about replacing it with no arguments, had a new one delivered right away, and thus the reason why I deal with Amazon. “Very professional”
customer_reviews.author: Dominick m Cavoto

customer_reviews.title: Thermometer non-functional
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were relatively clear and assembly was not too bad. I would have given it five stars except the thermometer is full of water and cannot be read after one day outside.
customer_reviews.author: icurn714

customer_reviews.title: Decent grill for the money
customer_reviews.text: As mentioned in the headline, it's a decent grill for the price. It cooks food evenly, but has an issue with flare-ups, even on low heat. It is fairly easy to clean, but after just a few cleanings, the drip pan is discolored. I am concerned the pan will rust soon. We use the grill three times a week, or so. I am not sure this grill will last more than a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: James K. Gensel

customer_reviews.title: Burnt on  a cold Grille...Broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: This grill is very poorly built and over the course of 1-month each burner has failed to work and we are now down to a 1-burner grill out of 4. The entire grill is a chincy piece of crap that is straight out of China. Spend the extra money so you don't take the chance of getting "burnt" on a cold grill!!
customer_reviews.author: ROKKET

customer_reviews.title: No assembly manual!
customer_reviews.text: No assembly manual, just a use manual. The parts on the cart are almost identical, but just. Enough different that the fit only one position and have to be rotated correctly for thenext bit of assembly. You won’t spend all of your time assembling this one— some will be spent disassemb
customer_reviews.author: W. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Loving this grill!
customer_reviews.text: This grill has exceptional features for the cost - an excellent value for sure. Assembly took about an hour and directions were fairly clear. Looks great and cooks fish better than any other grill we've had. My favorite feature is that you start the grill by turning the burner knobs. No more of those annoying ignitor buttons that don't work or need constant battery changes. Definite Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: T Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Keep Looking
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the BBQ 3 times and the grilling grills have lost their protective coating. I wash them in warm water with Dawn. I either have to buy new grills or a new BBQ. My last BBQ a Charbroil lasted 7 years and the grills were still in great shape, the burners burned out.
customer_reviews.author: my3sons

customer_reviews.title: Not hot enough
customer_reviews.text: This thing turned all the way up still won’t get grill marks on meat until about 8 minutes per side and by that point your meat is baked through. I called for help and they blamed it on the propane tank. We swapped it out twice and the thing just doesn’t put out good heat. Either ours is faulty or get a different grill. I’m really disappointed by this, but it’s not something I can disassemble and send back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PROPANE - NOT GAS AS DESCRIBED
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS PROPANE NOT GAS AS STATED. The grill delivered late which was not a big deal but when I opened it it was clearly propane not gas as is stated. Amazon did give me a refund which I do appreciate but I don't have the grill I thought I was ordering. I also called quizen art and they said that Amazon has been made aware of this item description being wrong multiple times. The grill looks great I just can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: #boymom2

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: the box came sealed, undamaged. the box was missing parts and the grill lid was slightly bent. there was no damage as i said on the box so i have to assume the package was boxed up with the bent lid and the missing parts from the factory. otherwise...nice looking bbq, not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey baker

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh so far
customer_reviews.text: Just put it together. Missing bolts, dents and customer service number incorrectly printed on grill. Called Cuisinart not holding my breath for a call back to get missing bolts. Haven't grilled on it yet
customer_reviews.author: TattoodMommy

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is an economical gas grill and it works just fine. The front panel was damaged during shipping, I did not notice this until I was pretty far into assembly- so we've decided to just live with it. It took me a few hours to put together, which was a bit of a pain. The fact that it was damaged and a bit bent out of shape prevented some of the holes from lining up- I had to re-bend it. Still, I got through it and it works fine; I deemed that easier than trying to take it all apart, repackage it and ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great heating variances for accurate doneness
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good product for the price. It had a small dent in the right side next to the knob, which disappointed me. That's what happens when we make package carriers deliver 77 lb grills to our front doors I guess... Used it once and my 2 inch thick (that's right- 2 inch) pork chop was cooked to perfection with the accurate heating capabilities this 4 burner grill offers.
customer_reviews.author: E. alvarez

customer_reviews.title: i like it
customer_reviews.text: but had a small dent in the right comer im going to try fix it but it cant be seen with the side shelf on it didn't realize it missing screws to attach the side shelf's where can i get some
customer_reviews.author: R. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Good grill at a good price
customer_reviews.text: You can spend a lot more for a grill, but this does all I need. Heat control is better than others propane grills I've had, so you can actually turn down the heat from high to low, instead of just high to slightly less high. The automatic lighter works real well so far. My only complaint is the grease trap is easy to spill when trying to remove it for emptying.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W Stull

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price - 4 Burner Gas Grill (Model #CGG-7400)
customer_reviews.text: This grill was able to be constructed by a smaller child (with adult doing heavy lifting) as a fun weekend project. Solid construction. Design is for function (not fancy). A few of the burners don't always fire up on first attempt at ignition (reason for four stars). Otherwise, early assessment is that this is a very good value for the money. Compared it to quite a few other four burner grills before purchase. I will be receiving a free gift (small grill scraper) for the review, but the contents of the review have not been influenced by that fact.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Not a Fan
customer_reviews.text: I guess for $199 it's OK. When my first grill arrive it was badly damaged. The cover and front of the grill was dented. I returned the grill and order a second one. When it arrived, it looked OK, but as I was assembling the grill, I found another dent on the lid. This was the only dent I found. I was tired of messing with it so I kept the grill. The grill does not get as hot as other grills I have a had in the past. It takes a while to grill your food. If I had to do it over I would spend the extra money and buy a better grill.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Sell AMERICAN MADE PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: If I knew it was made in CHINA would not have bought it! Try selling American made product. Next time I will read more about the product. I estimate that because it was made inCHINA it will only last me 2 years tops.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Grill!!!
customer_reviews.text: Heat output is perfect and ease of cleaning is a deal. This grill is very durable and worth the price for the quality. Has not disappointed in over a year and has stood up to the Florida elements very well.
customer_reviews.author: Antwan Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great value, time consuming to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Not the first propane powered grill I've owned but high quality and great value (at 1/3 the price of my last Weber). It was time-consuming to assemble, but I suspect this is probably true of all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S Fry

customer_reviews.title: Well build and maintains set temperature
customer_reviews.text: This grill was shipped quickly and in one big box containing pieces of the grill. The grill was easily assembled by one person in under an hour. The grill is solid and we'll made. The grill itself produces even heat and maintained the temperature inside the grill despite outside being in the 30's. In exchange for the review I received a free gift, but the views expressed our my own and I highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana F.

customer_reviews.title: Should've bought one of these a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: Great grill! Gets evenly hot and seems to have good build quality. Before this I had a cheap 2 burner grill that took forever to cook food. With this 4 burner it takes me half the time to cook 2x the amount of food. Easy to put together, I did it myself in about 1.5 hrs taking my time watching TV in the family room.
customer_reviews.author: D'Brickashaw

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a pretty good product for the price. I didn't see any damage on my unit, as others had mentioned. Installation is pretty easy, really no issues with that. I have cooked twice on it. The first time I used all 4 burners. The second time I used only 2 burners and the system struggled to get hot. Although it seems like a waste, I guess I might have to use all 4 burners every time. Note: I received a free gift in exchange for posting this review.
customer_reviews.author: Allison E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great grill and great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this grill to use at my condo. I have limited space and I must leave this out in all weather conditions. The grill arrived as stated. My son assembled it for me. It took less than an hour. All parts were included. Instructions were easy to follow. We christened it last weekend and it works beautifully. I am very happy with this purchase. And the price was great too. I also ordered the cover. I am happy to post this review and for doing so, I get a free grill scraper. This is a win, win situation.
customer_reviews.author: mary k meese

customer_reviews.title: Great grill for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last Sept. and I wanted to use it for awhile before reviewing it.I had a couple of Weber grills for the last 20 years but they priced me out of there market.I looked at many grills and I decided on Cuisinart CGG-7400 and I just love it so far.It heats perfectly.You just can't beat it for the money.I just hope it holds up awhile.The only thing I wasn't happy with,you can't get natural gas. Set-up was little hard but not awful.
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Cooks really good, easy to clean. Bought the bruschetta and brush it over the grates and ready to go for the next bar b que.
customer_reviews.author: Pedalingharv

customer_reviews.title: received a free gift in exchange for posting this review The grill was very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Note: received a free gift in exchange for posting this review The grill was very easy to put together, it took a total of one hour. We like the look of the grill. It is not super heavy like some of the grills out there. Burners ignite easily and quickly. Overall it is a great grill for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grill for beginners or veterans
customer_reviews.text: This grill works wonderfully. Gets very hot if you need it, stays at constant temperatures, is easy to clean, is universal for parts, and is just generally terrific. I have no complaints and would recommend to anyone. Especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Good basic grille
customer_reviews.text: Grille was easy to assemble. Burners provide ample heat and are low enough no to burn. The drip pan is away from the food so you don't get flare ups and things cook better. Probably the best cooking grille I've had. Good for burgers and steaks.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Bates

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had a huge grill with an oven that was perfect when my kids were small. Now, I have an empty house and wanted something smaller. I am very pleased with this grill so far! I was given a free gift in exchange for my review.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy from them again
customer_reviews.text: The front of my grill was dented & scratched when I got it. Also one of the holes to put the screw was stripped & caused me about an extra hour trying to make it work. I e never been able to figure out how to contact the company. Probably wouldn’t buy from them again. Product is decent overall. On of the knobs doesn’t light very well & it takes a few trys.
customer_reviews.author: Becky R

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Seems flimsy and not packed well It was bent and missing screws. The box had no damage, I had a webber and it is much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Your delivery personell were not too carefull
customer_reviews.text: I love the grill. What I very much dislike is the way it came in all dented !!! Very disappointed with the Amazon delivery . The box was badly dented as well as the grill top. I had to hammer out the dents to get it together . Not pleased at all ......I'm not looking for anything . Just letting you know it was very disappointing .
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Burner failure on first use
customer_reviews.text: Assembled and one of the burners is not firing properly and does not always light. Waiting to see how cuisinart and amazon handle the complaint....follow up tried to call and customer service line was backed up along with trying with Amazon. Disassembled the burner tube and found. bug blocking gas flow and this was right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: george young

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill But Know That There is Full Assembly Required
customer_reviews.text: We got this grill for my husband for his first Father's Day, and we're really enjoying it. Very sleek, and easy to use. Just a heads up for anyone that there is a good bit of assembly required (we thought we'd be able to quickly put together and then grill, but turned out we need to order take-out and then do our grilling the next night). Also wanted to note that we have received a free gift on behalf of Cuisinart (a grill scraper) for posting our review.
customer_reviews.author: CeraFit

customer_reviews.title: Good Luck With assembling -
customer_reviews.text: THERE WAS NO MANUAL! Three people worked on putting it together for over two hours.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Hulbert

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart grill at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I needed to buy a not so expensive reliable grill and Santa came through. Followed the step by step instructions and it was easy to assemble. I’m very happy with the high heat output for steaks, and the temperature gauge works good too. Lots of grill and work space! The built-in bottle opener is a nice touch for sure. Didn't think I could find or buy a Cuisinart product at such a great price. Next purchase will be a grill cover!
customer_reviews.author: Rod f.

customer_reviews.title: Great grill! Lots of time to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Great grill! Works wonderfully now that it is assembled and ready to go! Only complaint is that it came in a lot of pieces and took some time to put together. The directions has pictures but no words to explain what to do. Otherwise, love the product & it has already made many delicious meals for the family.
customer_reviews.author: Mamasgirls

customer_reviews.title: A great grill!
customer_reviews.text: Go ahead and buy it. You'll be glad you did! My only complaint is that it was bent in one area when we removed it from the box. BUT...it wasn't bad enough or worth the effort of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great Product at an amazing price, would recommend to anyone not wanting to spend $400-$500 on a similar product. Heats up quickly and retains a constant temperature. Great assembly instructions. I did receive a free gift for posting this review, but it did not affect my rating!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: It took me about an hour to assemble. Having most of the screws already in place made it go faster, which was nice. Fired right up! Each burner has it's own piezo electric starter so no matches needed, though a match holder is included on the frame. Baptized the new grill with a T-Bone steak! Cooked to perfection! I did receive a free gift in exchange for posting this review.
customer_reviews.author: Deano

customer_reviews.title: There have to be better options
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grill because I trusted the brand name...imagine my surprise and disappointment when it began to rust immediately...I mean, within a week it was rusting...not what I expected and would not recommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Suzyow

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the right first grill!
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, easy to assemble and has worked flawlessly. Only complaint is the positioning of the bottle opener, its horizontal, so you spill a lot of beer opening it! :(
customer_reviews.author: MLD

customer_reviews.title: There was a dent with the paint peeled off.
customer_reviews.text: I like the grill but opon opening it I saw a dent with the paint peeled off of the dent which means it's going to start rusting...
customer_reviews.author: linda plumb

customer_reviews.title: Grill was damaged
customer_reviews.text: I received the grill and the top part had a huge dent in the corner so the lid doesn’t close all the way.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: The grill is awesome! I am 62 female and me and my female cousin put it together! If I can do it anyone can! The grill is big, sturdy, works well and I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Darla McQueen

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made producing inadequate heat
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how cheaply made this is since Cuisinart usually produces quality products. Not this time. The burners do not produce enough heat for proper grilling no matter how long in advance it is lighted. You will regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: richard perle

customer_reviews.title: Defective handle
customer_reviews.text: There is a defect, the handle to open and close the grill was not set up correctly. No space/whole for screws to connect with the ends of handle. If I have done sth wrong, it’s on me, but if not, please return my money.
customer_reviews.author: R&G

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for a four burner grill
customer_reviews.text: Good buy for a four burner grill. Produces a good hot flame. Uses a mechanical method of ignition, so it can take a few tries to start.
customer_reviews.author: Fie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Good instructions, great design, easy to assemble, and fired right up after assembly.
customer_reviews.author: R. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for less than 16 months. It is kept covered and out of the weather. Two weeks ago the bottom of the grill was on my deck rusted out. See picture attached. DO NOT BUY. No quality what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: McDirty

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: This is the third BBQ I had had to return because it had been damaged. Looks like everyone had their corners smashed in. You didn't seem to do what I asked last time I returned it. These are terrible... George Yankovich
customer_reviews.author: forensic111

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sturdy. Only problem was attaching the handle. There were no holes on the inside of the hood to receive the screws, so we had to drill them. Otherwise, this is a very sturdy grill and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Marty C

customer_reviews.title: Love this grill
customer_reviews.text: This may be the best grill I have ever had. Easy to assemble. Only took about 30 minutes. Very even heat output and super easy to clean. Even the grease trap is well designed for easy removal and cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: t baxter

customer_reviews.title: The unit is nice, the directions were very clear and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: The unit is nice, the directions were very clear and easy to assemble. The only problem was that rear leg piece had an over weld on the top that would not allow the grill unit to sit on the leg assembly. A small hacksaw adjustment and the problem was solved.The review is being submitted to receive a free gift.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN DAVENPORT

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Heat output not quite as good as the retired grill. Simple to assemble. Grill lighting is easy and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Happy grillin on the barbie!
customer_reviews.text: We love this grill. It is just the right size. Heavy duty, so should last. Fairly easy to assemble. Looking forward to using it alot!
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect for my place. glad i bought this item
customer_reviews.author: Brandon & Cat

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve made all year.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this grill for just about a month and have used it almost every day. It was super easy to assemble, heats up fast and temp is easy to control. Cleaning the grill is easy. I would definitely recommend buying on and have recommended it to some of my friends. Best purchase of the year
customer_reviews.author: T.I

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grill Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Nice Quality easy to assemble just what We wanted to grill weenies and fish on a weeknight when there is not time for charcoal grilling I got a free grate cleaner for this review as well
customer_reviews.author: Meat

customer_reviews.title: Nice frill;
customer_reviews.text: The grill appears to be solid and overall good quality. Each burner starts individually with a turn of the knob. Nice. However I must be having a "stupid" day. Many of the reviews state about the ease of assembly. I did not find that. Took me, working alone, about 2.5 hours. I thought the directions were terrible. I've assembled grills before. Maybe it just wasn't my day. I get a free gift for writing this review.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great unit... but some minor damage
customer_reviews.text: the unit appears to work great. However there was a dent in the front part of the grill which I don't like but I don't want to put this darn thing together again. Don't know if Amazon is reading this but I would like a credit if possible.
customer_reviews.author: David Siess

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: It does not work at all. I can not get a hold of anyone on the phone. How am i supposed to return this? We did everything correct and it is not lighting. We tried to grill and ONLY one of the burners turned for like 5 minutes and then die. I need for someone to reach back to me, and tell me how to return this HUGE item.
customer_reviews.author: Nidia Silas

customer_reviews.title: Gas burners, ok for outdoor cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Acceptable quality, fair assembly. No lave rock so no charcoal like taste, just an outdoor gas burner. Wish I would have went with a grill with lava rock or charcoal. Built in china.
customer_reviews.author: Meter

customer_reviews.title: This full size grill was a great value!
customer_reviews.text: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat priced full size grill from Cuisinart July 21, 2019 Color: Full Size Four-Burner Gas Grill I expected good quality from Cuisinart. The 7400 was easy to assemble, the instructions are easy to follow, and the quality of the components could be more in line with a $300 or more grill. I received a free gift from Cuisinart for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a timely matter, unfortunately unable to put together right away. Assembly instructions and owner manual were not included. Looked up manual through order... instructions started at step 11. We were able to figure it out, but got stuck again when putting grill on to base due to no bolts being included, also missing a nut to hold 2nd wheel on. Unsure of how it grills since we are still in the process of assembling. More annoying than anything.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: REAL OUTDOOR COOKING
customer_reviews.text: WOW FROM THE LOOK TO THE FUNCTION .. AMAZING UNIT WITH 4 STRAIGHT TUBE BURNERS WITH FLARE SHIELDS OVER THEM AND A REMOVABLE ALUMINUM DRIP PAN (easy clean) ABSOLUTELY THE BEST GRILL FOR ANY PRICE.. EASY BUILD OUT OF THE BOX TOO LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: william L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: Really great barbecue at a such a great price, very happy with purchase. Large grilling space, looks good and works great!
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Great grill!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome grill. So happy with it. Took long to put together, otherwise amazing.
customer_reviews.author: IEW

customer_reviews.title: I am enjoying the super grill action even though it has been cold out
customer_reviews.text: Cuisinart quality in a grill! I am enjoying the super grill action even though it has been cold out. I get great cross grill marks with the premium cooking grates. For the price and quality I love it. Chicken was easy as can be with a nice roast to it. I received a gift in exchange for posting my review which was a bonus but I would have posted either way.
customer_reviews.author: John Vizuete

customer_reviews.title: It’s a very nice grill!
customer_reviews.text: It is very well made....the instructions were pretty easy to follow. It took a couple hours to put together. We were pleased with the grill.
customer_reviews.author: CiCi

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a family member. He said it assembled quickly and works very well. He’s pleased, so I am too.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Bennet

customer_reviews.title: iNFERIOR GRILLE
customer_reviews.text: i HAVE THIS GRILL FOR 8 MOMTHS NOW, NOT A LOT OF USE, AND THE REGULATOR HAS GONE BAD. tRYING TO GET IN TOUCH WITH CUISINEART TO IX OR REPLACE UNEDR WARRENTY IS IMPOSSIBLE. GOOD PRICE NOT WORTH THE MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Went together pretty easily. Only issue was having to drill holes for tank blocking wires. Sound construction and started right up. I see some had damage issues, which was likely because the large box it’s packed in requires 2 people to move. I just happened to be there when UPS driver delivered, and helped her unload. Not sure if she would have done so well without help! Overall, very pleased,
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

product_meta.title: Cuisinart CGG-7400 Propane, Full Size Four-Burner Gas Grill
product_meta.description: The Cuisinart 4-Burner Gas Grill is exactly what you need for your home. Cuisinart’s first full-size grill is one that was built to last and built to impress. With its 4 individually controllable burners, you’ll get 44,000 BTUs of cooking heat spread evenly across the 486 square inches of cooking surface. And if you’re looking for additional space, there’s a built-in warming rack that provides 202 additional square inches. With an easy twist to start ignition and removable cast iron cooking grates, this grill was made with the customer in mind. And no full-size grill is complete without side tables. The Cuisinart 4-Burner Gas Grill has two 18-inch x 13-inch side tables that provide plenty of extra space during a cookout.
feature_bullets: COOKING POWER: Four 11, 000 BTU burners provide a total 44, 000 BTUs of cooking power
COOKING SPACE: The grill is equipped with 443 square inch of cooking space with an additional 167 square inch warming rack
CAST IRON GRATES: Heavy-duty cast iron cooking grates are great for retaining heat
PREP SPACE: Two 18" x 13" side tables provide ample space for food prep
CONSTRUCTION: Stainless Steel lid and control panel. Actual product may vary from images shown due to product enhancement.
INCLUDED FEATURES: Grill utilizes drip tray to collect grease and drippings. 4-foot LP hose to connect the grill and the 20lb propane tank (propane not included).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars451 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
